properties.areaDesc: Pentwater to Manistee MI; Grand Haven to Whitehall MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI; Whitehall to Pentwater MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 12 at 12:00PM EST until February 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory today, southwest winds 15 to
25 knots and waves 3 to 6 feet. For the Gale Warning late
tonight and Thursday morning, north gales to 35 knots and waves
4 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...Holland to Manistee.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 1 AM to 1 PM EST Thursday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 1 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and largest waves will
occur late tonight and Thursday morning. The highest winds and
waves will be out over the open water, beyond 5 miles from
shore.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST THURSDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST THURSDAY
